title: What's The Alternative?
description:
“All around you see things you don’t like. Bad people getting away with stuff. The wrong incentives being offered, sending trends off in an alarming direction. Perhaps you’re worried about cancel culture or the rise of illiberalism. Maybe it’s corruption or systemic injustice. Maybe it’s apathy, indifference or stupidity.”

Ryan explains why you can never put off of being a better person.

Sign up for the Daily Stoic email: http://DailyStoic.com/signup
